Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Dearborn/Washington
ShortDescription: Northbound 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State, and Washington, due to street blockage near Dearborn/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State, Washington and over regular route, due to street blockage near Dearborn/Washington.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express and #26 South Shore Express Temporary Reroute near South Shore/78th
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express and 26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted due to a street blockage near South Shore/78th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express and #26 South Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted due to a street blockage near South Shore/78th.

Southbound buses will operate via South Shore Drive, 75th, Coles, 79th, South Shore, over normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via South Shore, 79th, Coles, 75th, South Shore Drive, over normal route. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near South Shore/78th
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a street blockage near South Shore/78th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to a street blockage near South Shore/78th.

Southbound buses will operate via 75th, Coles, 79th, South Shore Drive, over normal route.

Northbound buses will operate via South Shore Drive, 79th, Coles, 75th, over normal route. 

Allow extra travel time.
